Description: Is the main entrance to this building accessible?
2-5 character short form of building name, either the acronym of building name or derived from building name. Building Code for academic buildings may be used as classroom codes where applicable.

The name of the locality assigned to a given site by an address authority.
The street address of the main building address (if it has one).
Postal Code assigned by Canada Post for the purposes to deliver mail. Required once STATUS = Complete (Canada Post assigns postal code)
